oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greater Revelations Baptist Church, 2001 November 17
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Greater Revelations Baptist Church, formerly Church of the Living God. This church is located at 1029 Twelfth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. The foundation is concrete. The exterior walls are light colored brick in the stretched bond style with aluminum trim. The roof is comprised of brown asphalt. The windows are single paned glass, covered with painted iron bars in a cross pattern. Other features include a stone looking veneer on the front facade and aluminum rotating vents stationed on the roof. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greater Revelation Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Church of the Living God (Nashville, Tenn.)
